info.title: GNS3 controller API
info.description: This page describes the public controller API for GNS3

get.description: Web user interface
Return the server version number.

post.description: Check if version is the same as the server.
Reload the controller
Shutdown the server

get.description: Return the IOU license settings
Return server statistics.
Receive controller notifications about the controller from HTTP stream.

post.description:
Default user login method using forms (x-www-form-urlencoded).
Example: curl http://host:port/v3/users/login -H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" -d "username=admin&password=admin"

Alternative authentication method using json.
Example: curl http://host:port/v3/users/authenticate -d '{"username": "admin", "password": "admin"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json"

get.description: Return the GNS3 VM settings.

builtin.title: Whether the appliance is builtin or not

description.title: Description of the appliance. Could be a marketing description

documentation_url.title: An optional documentation for using the appliance on vendor website

product_url.title: An optional product url on vendor website

registry_version.title: Version of the registry compatible with this appliance

status.title: Document if the appliance is working or not

availability.title: About image availability: can be downloaded directly; download requires a free registration; paid but a trial version (time or feature limited) is available; not available publicly

symbol.title: An optional symbol for the appliance

first_port_name.title: Optional name of the first networking port example: eth0

port_name_format.title: Optional formating of the networking port example: eth{0}

port_segment_size.title: Optional port segment size. A port segment is a block of port. For example Ethernet0/0 Ethernet0/1 is the module 0 with a port segment size of 2

linked_clone.title: False if you don't want to use a single image for all nodes

download_url.title: Download url where you can download the appliance from a browser

direct_download_url.title: Optional. Non authenticated url to the image file where you can download the image.

compression.title: Optional, compression type of direct download url image.

node_types.title: Node Types
node_types.description: Node types supported by the compute

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: Platform where the compute is running (Linux, Windows or macOS)

cpus.title: Cpus
cpus.description: Number of CPUs on this compute

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: Amount of memory on this compute

connected.title: Connected
connected.description: Whether the controller is connected to the compute or not

last_error.title: Last Error
last_error.description: Last error found on the compute

image.title: Docker image in the Docker Hub

start_command.title: Command executed when the container start. Empty will use the default

console_type.title: Type of console connection for the administration of the appliance

console_http_port.title: Console Http Port
console_http_port.description: Internal port in the container of the HTTP server

extra_hosts.title: Extra Hosts
extra_hosts.description: Hosts which will be written to /etc/hosts into container

extra_volumes.title: Extra Volumes
extra_volumes.description: Additional directories to make persistent that are not included in the images VOLUME directive

Engine.title: Engine
Engine.description: "The engine to use for the GNS3 VM.

when_exit.description: Action when the GNS3 VM exits

headless.title: Headless
headless.description: Start the GNS3 VM GUI or not

engine.description: The engine to use for the GNS3 VM

vcpus.title: Vcpus
vcpus.description: Number of CPUs to allocate for the GNS3 VM

ram.title: Ram
ram.description: Amount of memory to allocate for the GNS3 VM

license_check.title: License Check
license_check.description: Whether the license must be checked or not

style.title: Style
style.description: SVG style attribute. Apply default style if null

x.title: X
x.description: Relative X position of the label. Center it if null

y.title: Y
y.description: Relative Y position of the label

capturing.title: Capturing
capturing.description: Read only property. True if a capture running on the link

capture_file_name.title: Capture File Name
capture_file_name.description: Read only property. The name of the capture file if a capture is running

capture_file_path.title: Capture File Path
capture_file_path.description: Read only property. The full path of the capture file if a capture is running

capture_compute_id.title: Capture Compute Id
capture_compute_id.description: Read only property. The compute identifier where a capture is running

LoggedInUserUpdate.title: LoggedInUserUpdate
LoggedInUserUpdate.description: Properties to update a logged-in user.

console_auto_start.title: Console Auto Start
console_auto_start.description: Automatically start the console when the node has started

locked.title: Locked
locked.description: Whether the element locked or not

port_name_format.title: Port Name Format
port_name_format.descript_port_name_formation: Formatting for port name {0} will be replace by port number

template_id.title: Template Id
template_id.description: Template UUID from which the node has been created. Read only

node_directory.title: Node Directory
node_directory.description: Working directory of the node. Read only

command_line.title: Command Line
command_line.description: Command line use to start the node. Read only

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of the node. Read only

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of the node. Read only

ports.title: Ports
ports.description: List of node ports. Read only

console_host.title: Console Host
console_host.description: Console host. Warning if the host is 0.0.0.0 or :: (listen on all interfaces) you need to use the same address you use to connect to the controller

console_auto_start.title: Console Auto Start
console_auto_start.description: Automatically start the console when the node has started

locked.description: Whether the element locked or not

port_name_format.descript_port_name_formation: Formatting for port name {0} will be replace by port number
